title: Braless Nicola McLean bares ALL in JUST a slashed jumper | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now She paired the sexy ensemble with a pair of raunchy thigh high boots complete with a staggering heel and plush suede body. Nicole toted a no-doubt designer brown leather handbag which she carried on her arm while strutting her stuff and loading up her car. Despite the low-key nature of her outing, she was heavily made-up, with lashings of make-up - with fluttering false eyelashes and a smudged smokey eye. Legs eleven: Nicola's frame was certainly sexy, as she showed off her sizzling physique Smoking hot: Despite the low-key nature of her outing, she was heavily made-up, with lashings of make-up - with fluttering false eyelashes and a smudged smokey eye Careful! The stunner was at risk of baring all as she peeled up her jumper During her time in the house, the blonde beauty spoke about her various rows, as she claims she was vilified on the Channel 5 show. After falling out with Kim she also was at loggerheads with Jedward, who she claims purposely tried to get a reaction out of her. She said on the show: 'Jedward just try to dig at you and try to provoke a reaction and I always give it to them... Not cool: During her time in the house, the blonde beauty spoke about her various rows, as she claims she was vilified on the Channel 5 show Smiling again: After falling out with Kim she also was at loggerheads with Jedward, who she claims purposely tried to get a reaction out of her Designer diva: Nicole toted a no-doubt designer brown leather handbag which she carried on her arm while strutting her stuff and loading up her car Strutting her stuff: She said on the show: 'Jedward just try to dig at you and try to provoke a reaction and I always give it to them.. 'I'm an emotional wreck always ready to blow. I have a lot of issues but I'm not sad.' Despite her troubles in the house, Nicola was overjoyed to be reunited with her husband Tom Williams, as she revealed: 'Me and my husband yes, we had great sex (when I left the show) - it was wonderful. Yeah it was lovely!' She was no doubt happy to be on good terms with her beau after admitting in the house she feared he would 'hate her'. Back! Yeah it was lovely!'
